fyDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum fyDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have called `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","daiToBorrow":"Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","maximumFYDai":"Maximum amount of FYDai to borrow.","to":"Wallet to send the resulting Dai to."}},"borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiApprove(address)":{"details":"Set proxy approvals for `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool."},"borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiCheck(address)":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` will set the approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature If `return` is `(true, true)`, `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Borrow fyDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum fyDai debt.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","controllerSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.","daiToBorrow":"Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","maximumFYDai":"Maximum amount of FYDai to borrow.","to":"Wallet to send the resulting Dai to."}},"buyDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Buy Dai for fyDai Caller must have approved the fyDai transfer with `fyDai.approve(maxFYDaiIn)` or with `buyDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the proxy using`pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy)` or with `buyDaiWithSignature`.","params":{"daiOut":"Amount of dai being bought","maxFYDaiIn":"Maximum amount of fyDai being sold","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"buyDaiCheck(address)":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `buyDai`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `buyDaiWithSignature` must be called with a fyDai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `buyDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `buyDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"buyDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint128,uint128,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Buy Dai for fyDai and permits infinite fyDai to the pool","params":{"daiOut":"Amount of dai being bought","fyDaiSig":"packed signature for approving fyDai transfers to a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","maxFYDaiIn":"Maximum amount of fyDai being sold","poolSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"post(address)":{"details":"Users use `post` in BorrowProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.","params":{"to":"Yield Vault to deposit collateral in."}},"repayDaiCheck()":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `repayDaiWithSignature`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `repayDaiWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `repayDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `repayDaiWithSignature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures. If `return` is `(true, true, any)`, `controller.repayDai` can be called directly and won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"repayDaiWithSignature(bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Burns Dai from caller to repay debt in a Yield Vault. User debt is decreased for the given collateral and fyDai series, in Yield vault `to`. The amount of debt repaid changes according to series maturity and MakerDAO rate and chi, depending on collateral type. `A signature is provided as a parameter to this function, so that `dai.approve()` doesn't need to be called.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","controllerSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.","daiAmount":"Amount of Dai to use for debt repayment.","daiSig":"packed signature for permit of dai transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","to":"Yield vault to repay debt for."}},"repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for fyDai at pool rates, with a minimum of fyDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","minimumFYDaiRepayment":"Minimum amount of fyDai debt to repay.","repaymentInDai":"Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.","to":"Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for."}},"repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiApprove(address)":{"details":"Set proxy approvals for `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` with a given pool."},"repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiCheck(address)":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` with a given pool. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` will set the approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature If `return[2]` is `false`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature(address,bytes32,uint256,address,uint256,uint256,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for fyDai at pool rates, with a minimum of fyDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.","params":{"collateral":"Valid collateral type.","controllerSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.","maturity":"Maturity of an added series","minimumFYDaiRepayment":"Minimum amount of fyDai debt to repay.","poolSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","repaymentInDai":"Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.","to":"Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for."}},"sellDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Sell Dai for fyDai Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(fyDaiUsed)` or with `sellDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the proxy using`pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy)` or with `sellDaiWithSignature`.","params":{"daiIn":"Amount of dai being sold","minFYDaiOut":"Minimum amount of fyDai being bought","to":"Wallet receiving the fyDai being bought"}},"sellDaiCheck(address)":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `sellDai`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `sellDaiWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `sellDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `sellDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"sellDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint128,uint128,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Sell Dai for fyDai","params":{"daiIn":"Amount of dai being sold","daiSig":"packed signature for approving Dai transfers to a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","minFYDaiOut":"Minimum amount of fyDai being bought","poolSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","to":"Wallet receiving the fyDai being bought"}},"sellFYDai(address,address,uint128,uint128)":{"details":"Sell fyDai for Dai Caller must have approved the fyDai transfer with `fyDai.approve(fyDaiUsed)` or with `sellFYDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the proxy using`pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy)` or with `sellFYDaiWithSignature`.","params":{"fyDaiIn":"Amount of fyDai being sold","minDaiOut":"Minimum amount of dai being bought","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"sellFYDaiCheck(address)":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `sellFYDai`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `sellFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a fyDai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `sellFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `sellFYDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"sellFYDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint128,uint128,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"Sell fyDai for Dai","params":{"fyDaiIn":"Amount of fyDai being sold","fyDaiSig":"packed signature for approving fyDai transfers to a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","minDaiOut":"Minimum amount of dai being bought","poolSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.","to":"Wallet receiving the dai being bought"}},"withdraw(address,uint256)":{"details":"Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function. Users must have called `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or `withdrawWithSignature` to authorize BorrowProxy to act in their behalf.","params":{"amount":"Amount of weth to move.","to":"Wallet to send Eth to."}},"withdrawCheck()":{"details":"Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `withdrawWithSignature`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `withdrawWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return` is `(true, true)`, `withdrawWithSignature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures."},"withdrawWithSignature(address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function.","params":{"amount":"Amount of weth to move.","controllerSig":"packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. .sol":{"keccak256":"0x5304a4ea3376c41b4d72b7f1630f20ba234d3f3a46b1559471e2d828bcf7002f","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://b5cf7b0d7c95c471188869fe6a6e33ebc22fa45972511f3484baade9aee9fe93","dweb:/ipfs/QmZwmGA3w91piL9D7yaiRwtdUhNzdb5FZDSGH634EdhB2s"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IDelegable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x49e77efeec6b9beed08974b0b73463fd59a347b8e7ac73c88a07494a71914651","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://610f080555163b2e4b726e454db4b787a1a580f8e6299870870cb29dcd49156d","dweb:/ipfs/QmQp2QHHAzY3js1WHb3xEmSexAEcLPprCWgyf7N2Y1WAoQ"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IERC2612.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe79dd739aaa881172ede4d81472ded9db3a0b4183573c0c01541b4084033b222","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://7c31da718a2a57077616f0990285297503d21bf42b99602d210de90910058a76","dweb:/ipfs/QmWebwLKbC21hwXDYqS8Wt97Uyx7ALUNj3id4LYpkLsk6S"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IFYDai.sol":{"keccak256":"0xea67d6d62ae90ecb15caa27853a88b6f8c347c98ab92ce928fdef40d0aa4e06c","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://5e83cfe73aa3b0ca866d6c4ba0b4aeacbf25124ef85b2ee53f07fe33b74c9b85","dweb:/ipfs/QmQnJwdYMeDwD24qJ4fbSxDjGx31jgErUSCUFvsuefKfZ4"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IGemJoin.sol":{"keccak256":"0x39f218d42d5f25c0a91def8cda77ac15a923520b74ed29641210cae9743be231","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://8d4a30653035018424aad006f6247acfa76b1e486a0d707966dc6224aab7f93c","dweb:/ipfs/QmRxHbSctCd7sk89E8DNBxBZgtE29qYJZ5TzRsFNXT9YwY"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IPool.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb71636e756b5df730016c506483f27daf7de4d7c8d3f567d1dc0e43fbd8ea3e6","license":"GPL-3.0-or-later","urls":["bzz-raw://0b8626393cb39c5bdb011c2bdbdaeea543698785c4dc08dafb929e677a7d0a5e","dweb:/ipfs/QmSpaXxXKnpCHrhVvUKRWcCVro9HM8ebPwd2ZsUAmGLy7r"]},"/Users/brucedonovan/dev/yield/yDai/contracts/interfaces/IPot.sol":{"keccak256":"0x9a793ca8c04 documentation.text: @dev The WETH9 contract will send ether to BorrowProxy on `weth.withdraw` using this function.

@dev Users use `post` in BorrowProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.
 @param to Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "BorrowProxy: Not enough fyDai debt repaid"

arguments.value: BorrowProxy: Not enough fyDai debt repaid

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "BorrowProxy: Not enough fyDai debt repaid"

documentation.text:
@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `withdrawWithSignature`.
 `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `withdrawWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true)`, `withdrawWithSignature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool.
 If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` will set the approvals.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature
 If `return` is `(true, true)`, `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool.

@dev Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `repayDaiWithSignature`.
 `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed.
 If `return[1]` is `false`, `repayDaiWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature.
 If `return[2]` is `false`, `repayDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature.
 If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `repayDaiWithSignature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
 If `return` is `(true, true, any)`, `controller.repayDai` can be called directly and won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.
@dev Set proxy approvals for `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` with a given pool.

 If `return[2]` is `false`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature

borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai(address,bytes32.details: Borrow fyDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum fyDai debt. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have called `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` at least once before to set proxy approvals.

params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.maximumFYDai: Maximum amount of FYDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiApprove(address).details: Set proxy approvals for `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool.

borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiCheck(address).details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` with a given pool. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` will set the approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature If `return` is `(true, true)`, `borrowDaiForMaximumFYDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

borrowDaiForMaximumFYDaiWithSignature(ad.details: Borrow fyDai from Controller and sell it immediately for Dai, for a maximum fyDai debt.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.daiToBorrow: Exact amount of Dai that should be obtained.
params.maximumFYDai: Maximum amount of FYDai to borrow.
params.to: Wallet to send the resulting Dai to.

buyDai(address,address,uint128,uint128).details: Buy Dai for fyDai Caller must have approved the fyDai transfer with `fyDai.approve(maxFYDaiIn)` or with `buyDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the proxy using`pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy)` or with `buyDaiWithSignature`.

params.maxFYDaiIn: Maximum amount of fyDai being sold
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

buyDaiCheck(address).details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `buyDai`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `buyDaiWithSignature` must be called with a fyDai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `buyDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `buyDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

buyDaiWithSignature(address,address,uint.details: Buy Dai for fyDai and permits infinite fyDai to the pool

params.fyDaiSig: packed signature for approving fyDai transfers to a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.maxFYDaiIn: Maximum amount of fyDai being sold
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

post(address).details: Users use `post` in BorrowProxy to post ETH to the Controller (amount = msg.value), which will be converted to Weth here.

params.to: Yield Vault to deposit collateral in.

repayDaiCheck().details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `repayDaiWithSignature`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `repayDaiWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `repayDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `repayDaiWithSignature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures. If `return` is `(true, true, any)`, `controller.repayDai` can be called directly and won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

repayDaiWithSignature(bytes32,uint256,ad.details: Burns Dai from caller to repay debt in a Yield Vault. User debt is decreased for the given collateral and fyDai series, in Yield vault `to`. The amount of debt repaid changes according to series maturity and MakerDAO rate and chi, depending on collateral type. `A signature is provided as a parameter to this function, so that `dai.approve()` doesn't need to be called.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.daiAmount: Amount of Dai to use for debt repayment.
params.daiSig: packed signature for permit of dai transfers to this proxy. Ignored if '0x'.
params.to: Yield vault to repay debt for.

repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai(address,byte.details: Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for fyDai at pool rates, with a minimum of fyDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.

params.minimumFYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of fyDai debt to repay.
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.

repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiApprove(addre.details: Set proxy approvals for `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` with a given pool.

repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiCheck(address.details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` with a given pool. If `return[0]` is `false`, calling `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` will set the approvals. If `return[1]` is `false`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature If `return[2]` is `false`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature.details: Repay an amount of fyDai debt in Controller using a given amount of Dai exchanged for fyDai at pool rates, with a minimum of fyDai debt required to be paid. Must have approved the operator with `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. Must have approved the operator with `pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or with `repayMinimumFYDaiDebtForDaiWithSignature`. If `repaymentInDai` exceeds the existing debt, only the necessary Dai will be used.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
params.minimumFYDaiRepayment: Minimum amount of fyDai debt to repay.
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.repaymentInDai: Exact amount of Dai that should be spent on the repayment.
params.to: Yield Vault to repay fyDai debt for.

sellDai(address,address,uint128,uint128).details: Sell Dai for fyDai Caller must have approved the dai transfer with `dai.approve(fyDaiUsed)` or with `sellDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the proxy using`pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy)` or with `sellDaiWithSignature`.

params.minFYDaiOut: Minimum amount of fyDai being bought
params.to: Wallet receiving the fyDai being bought

sellDaiCheck(address).details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `sellDai`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `sellDaiWithSignature` must be called with a dai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `sellDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `sellDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

params.daiSig: packed signature for approving Dai transfers to a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.minFYDaiOut: Minimum amount of fyDai being bought
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.to: Wallet receiving the fyDai being bought

sellFYDai(address,address,uint128,uint12.details: Sell fyDai for Dai Caller must have approved the fyDai transfer with `fyDai.approve(fyDaiUsed)` or with `sellFYDaiWithSignature`. Caller must have approved the proxy using`pool.addDelegate(borrowProxy)` or with `sellFYDaiWithSignature`.

params.minDaiOut: Minimum amount of dai being bought
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

sellFYDaiCheck(address).details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `sellFYDai`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `sellFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a fyDai permit signature. If `return[2]` is `false`, `sellFYDaiWithSignature` must be called with a pool signature. If `return` is `(true, true, true)`, `sellFYDai` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

params.fyDaiSig: packed signature for approving fyDai transfers to a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.minDaiOut: Minimum amount of dai being bought
params.poolSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in a pool. Ignored if '0x'.
params.to: Wallet receiving the dai being bought

withdraw(address,uint256).details: Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function. Users must have called `controller.addDelegate(borrowProxy.address)` or `withdrawWithSignature` to authorize BorrowProxy to act in their behalf.

withdrawCheck().details: Determine whether all approvals and signatures are in place for `withdrawWithSignature`. `return[0]` is always `true`, meaning that no proxy approvals are ever needed. If `return[1]` is `false`, `withdrawWithSignature` must be called with a controller signature. If `return` is `(true, true)`, `withdrawWithSignature` won't fail because of missing approvals or signatures.

withdrawWithSignature(address,uint256,by.details: Users wishing to withdraw their Weth as ETH from the Controller should use this function.

params.controllerSig: packed signature for delegation of this proxy in the controller. Ignored if '0x'.
